chargeHist.descr: Operator Flee/Elude Officer-Bodily Harm or Property Damage

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marquel J Moorehead

records.addlTxt:
ADJOURNED OFF THE RECORD VIA EMAIL.
Case calendared for a Plea and Sentencing Hearing.
Court is in trial on a different matter and ordered case adjourned.
Parties notified via email and new date selected 
This hearing will be held in person before Branch19.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Marquel J Moorehead not in court, defendant in custody.  Stephan Eduard Nolten on behalf of Francesco Mineo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Case in court for a Status Conference. Defendant is at MSDF. Defense request a plea and sentencing hearing date. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  
Parties advised this hearing will be held in person, Room 313 of the Safety Building. 
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw in court, defendant Marquel J Moorehead not in court, in custody, appearance waived.  Francesco Mineo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties need additional time, requesting additional status. Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that as of July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Branch 6, Judge Ellen Brostrom, in Room 608 of the Courthouse.  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Wagner.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Kies, Br. 45.

Defendant Marquel J Moorehead in court with Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw; both appear by video.  Defendant Marquel J Moorehead in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45. Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 45.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Marquel J Moorehead in court with attorney William Anthony Rakestraw.  Defendant Marquel J Moorehead in custody.  Emily S Zimmel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquel J Moorehead appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
